name: Bad Shepherd
description:
"Guide" the Sheep back to their barn

2D top down puzzle game with the goal of returning the sheep back to their barn.It aims to immerse the players in puzzle solving in the scenery of rural era gaelic ireland while a narrative unravels on the backdrop.

Features:

  • Experimentation
  • Storytelling
  • Puzzle Solving

Controls:

Team credits:

Octávio Silva (Game Designer/Programmer)

Diogo Santos(Game Artist/Animator)
